name: Leap Pumpkin
description:
Made for West Jam, as part of West Jam Four, a weekend-long game jam!

Make it to the end of each stage through sacrificing your characters. Sacrifice them in the right ways, and they'll remain as platforms. But don't go sacrificing too much!

WASD - Move

Space - Jump

Left-Click - Sacrifice, or Select Button

R - Restart

Development, and Screams by DallaswithaD

Character and Background 3D, and 2D Sprites by Swiftzonic

Environment 3D by MentalUntilDawn
